item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 3, 2025 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Firefly ‘Blue Ghost’ lunar lander touches down on the moon (537 points | 127 comments)
2. Made a scroll bar buddy that walks down the page when you scroll (401 points | 148 comments)
3. MIT 6.S184: Introduction to Flow Matching and Diffusion Models (142 points | 12 comments)
4. Man's brain turned to glass by hot Vesuvius ash cloud (111 points | 32 comments)
5. Robust Wavefront OBJ model parsing in C (38 points | 23 comments)
6. Harvest the sun twice: Agrivoltaics promises sustainable food, energy and water (87 points | 48 comments)
7. Show HN: Tangled – Git collaboration platform built on atproto (91 points | 6 comments)
8. Gooey rubber that's slowly ruining old hard drives (225 points | 145 comments)
9. Speedrunners are vulnerability researchers, they just don't know it yet (306 points | 76 comments)
10. Phlex for Rails Emails: Action Mailer Without ERB (25 points | 2 comments)
11. ninjavis – generate visualization from ninja build logs (17 points | discuss)
12. Smallpond – A lightweight data processing framework built on DuckDB and 3FS (261 points | 62 comments)
13. The Pentium contains a complicated circuit to multiply by three (303 points | 114 comments)
14. Hallucinations in code are the least dangerous form of LLM mistakes (270 points | 211 comments)
15. Alibaba Launches C930 RISC-V Chip Amid Shift from Western Tech (33 points | 3 comments)
16. Blender-made movie Flow takes Oscar (561 points | 85 comments)
17. API design note: Beware of adding an "Other" enum value (192 points | 102 comments)
18. We in-housed our data labelling (45 points | 22 comments)
19. Virtual museum of socialist era graphic design in Bulgaria (31 points | 2 comments)
20. Why do we have both CSRF protection and CORS? (202 points | 98 comments)
21. A Few of the Birds I Love (66 points | 24 comments)
22. Amazon's Drones Are Grounded. The Birds and Dogs of This Texas Town Are Grateful (5 points | discuss)
23. Geothermal power is a climate moon shot beneath our feet (235 points | 230 comments)
24. I struggled with Git, so I'm making a game to spare others the pain (190 points | 250 comments)
25. Gödel's theorem debunks the most important AI myth – Roger Penrose [video] (146 points | 281 comments)
26. Show HN: Prompting LLMs in Bash scripts (63 points | 5 comments)
27. Schools reviving shop class (224 points | 169 comments)
28. Matt's Script Archive (1995) (115 points | 47 comments)
29. Turning my ESP32 into a DNS sinkhole to fight doomscrolling (92 points | 29 comments)
30. Raspberry Pi Pico audio player (140 points | 36 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 3, 2025 at 1:25 PM UTC
